messages.title: AN IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM HELEN WHATELY ABOUT YOUR POSTAL VOTE
messages.content: This election will decide who leads Britain: David Cameron or Ed Miliband. The choice is between continued economic recovery or Labour’s taxes and wasteful spending. As your MP the NHS will be my top priority. I want consistently excellent healthcare and I’ll use my career experience to help – but the NHS also depends on a strong economy. I’ll campaign to get the balance right on development. We need homes for the next generation, but we mustn’t destroy rural Kent in the process.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The election is a decision on whether David Cameron or Ed Miliband leads Britain.
Promotes continued economic recovery over Labour’s taxes and wasteful spending.
The NHS will be a top priority, aiming for consistently excellent healthcare.
Campaigns to balance development needs with the preservation of rural Kent.

issues.economy: Promotes continued economic recovery over Labour’s taxes and wasteful spending.
issues.health: The NHS will be a top priority, aiming for consistently excellent healthcare.

housing.content: We need homes for the next generation, but we mustn’t destroy rural Kent in the process.

quotes.text: This election is a clear choice between five more years of competent Conservative leadership or a return to the economic chaos of a Labour government led by Ed Miliband.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Your postal vote will make a difference, please don’t waste it.
